Writing Extraction Line Scripts¶

def main():
    open('A')
    sleep(1)
    close('A')

    info('this is an info message')

    acquire('pipette')
    info('loading air shot')
    open('X')
    sleep(15)
    close('X')
    release('pipette')

extraction line functions¶

open(alias)¶

open the valve named alias e.g open('A')

close(alias)¶

open the valve named alias e.g close('A')
